alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 20 at 2:47PM MDT until March 21 at 3:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM MDT TUESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM TUESDAY TO 6 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Central Mountains. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 3 AM MDT Tuesday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 3 PM Tuesday to 6 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
